label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_005
content:
## 2026-01-06 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /storage/cluster_capacity: REQUESTS req | p50: 12ms p95: 25ms p99: 40ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/node_utilization: REQUESTS req | p50: 8ms p95: 18ms p99: 30ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/rebalance: REQUESTS req | p50: 10ms p95: 22ms p99: 35ms | err: 0.3% (3 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/compaction: REQUESTS req | p50: 9ms p95: 20ms p99: 33ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/io: REQUESTS req | p50: 11ms p95: 24ms p99: 38ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/storage_efficiency: REQUESTS req | p50: 7ms p95: 15ms p99: 25ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/backup_verification: REQUESTS req | p50: 13ms p95: 27ms p99: 42ms | err: 0.4% (4 errors) | success: 99.6%
- /storage/quota_enforcement: REQUESTS req | p50: 6ms p95: 14ms p99: 22ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/ingest: REQUESTS req | p50: 10ms p95: 21ms p99: 34ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/reliability: REQUESTS req | p50: 8ms p95: 19ms p99: 31ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/metadata: REQUESTS req | p50: 12ms p95: 26ms p99: 41ms | err: 0.3% (3 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/maintenance: REQUESTS req | p50: 7ms p95: 16ms p99: 27ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-21: CPU 78% | Mem 80% | Disk Used 96% | Conns: 1200 | Net: 8.2/7.1 Mbps
- stor-b-06: CPU 63% | Mem 72% | Disk Used 92% | Conns: 950 | Net: 6.4/5.8 Mbps
- stor-c-03: CPU 55% | Mem 67% | Disk Used 89% | Conns: 870 | Net: 5.3/4.9 Mbps
- meta-01: CPU 60% | Mem 86% | Disk Used 78% | Conns: 650 | Net: 2.9/2.3 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-storage: active 45 | idle 10 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 0 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 12ms
- pool-db: active 20 | idle 15 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max: 40 | avg_wait: 8ms
- pool-cache: active 30 | idle 20 | waiting 3 | exhaustion 1 | max: 50 | avg_wait: 10ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92% | Bandwidth: 3.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 12,450

### Alerts
- [WARNING] compaction backlog on storage cluster: >80 pending
- [INFO] snapshot verification failure on cold tier shard: transient read error
- [CRITICAL] quota hard blocks for 3 tenants
- [INFO] rebalance throughput increased overnight to move 78 TB from top nodes

### Deployments & Changes
- Adjusted compaction scheduling to avoid peak ingest hours
- Initiated targeted deep scrub on cold tier shard
- Coordinated cleanup for tenants over quota
- Enabled temporary burst for regulated namespace with approval
- Increased rebalance throughput window overnight

### Events
- Compaction backlog rose above 80 pending; adjusted compaction scheduling to avoid peak ingest hours and reduced backlog growth.
- One snapshot verification failure due to transient read error on cold tier shard; initiated targeted deep scrub and re-verified successfully.
- Quota hard blocks triggered for three tenants after rapid ingest; coordinated cleanup and enabled temporary burst for one regulated namespace with approval.
- Increased rebalance throughput window overnight to cool hottest node at 96%+; moved 78 TB from top 5 nodes.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Hasan R. 5 pages. 10 tickets. Status: Busy; compaction pressure and quota blocks required coordination. No hardware failures today; continued targeted scrubs for cold tier.
